data.title: Mr. Balwant Singh
data.text:
Dr. Balwant Singh

Department:

Position:

Experience (Years):

Information technology

Assistant Professor

16

Brief Profile:

B. Tech and M.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering. Currently PhD Scholar and Research topic is “Improving spectral efficiency in device to Device Communication”.

Also Post Graduate Diploma in "Embedded System and VLSI Design" from CDAC Noida.

Total year of Experience is 15 Year. Currently Assistant Professor IMSEC Ghaziabad.

Research interest include wireless communication, Mobile communication and Device to Device Communication. Area of interest is Signal System, Digital and Analog Communication, Wireless and Mobile Communication, Data Communication and Digital Signal Processing
